battery_level.docs:
The information for the battery level sensor.
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the battery level sensor.
  
  * **id** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  



*See also: [AM43 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/am43.html#configuration-variables)*

illuminance.docs:
The information for the light level sensor.
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the light level sensor.
  
  * **id** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  



*See also: [AM43 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/am43.html#configuration-variables)*

ble_client_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the `ble_client` entry associated with the device.



*See also: [AM43 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/am43.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.



*See also: [AM43 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/am43.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.



*See also: [AM43 Cover](https://esphome.io/components/cover/am43.html#configuration-variables)*

pin.docs:
**int**: The pin for the device, as set in the app. The default is usually printed on the device. Defaults to `8888`.



*See also: [AM43 Cover](https://esphome.io/components/cover/am43.html#configuration-variables)*

invert_position.docs:
**boolean**: Inverts the position value to and from the device. Set if ESPHome is swapping around the open/close state of the cover.



*See also: [AM43 Cover](https://esphome.io/components/cover/am43.html#configuration-variables)*

ble_client_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the `ble_client` entry associated with the device.



*See also: [AM43 Cover](https://esphome.io/components/cover/am43.html#configuration-variables)*
